title: KupaCrypto
author: KupaCrypto
content: Most people are good at condemning people because of their religion and what they believe in while other people condemn people because of the colour of Their skin,Religion has come between many countries of the world, it has led to war and some attacks, it has also let to killing nationally and internationally,  Racism on the other hand has done many damages to individuals and have ruined many lives so either of them is an enemy of national and international Unity we should love each other and the love we have for each other Should go beyond our skin colour and our religious beliefs and we should always understand that we are one and all humans.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Government is required to stay out of religion. At least in the US. So, they are promoting racism instead. How? By fighting the race of racists. Government, the biggest racists in town.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: I think racism is more dangerous then religion. It is a true statement and history itself shows how racism continues to exist and continues daily worldwide. There is so much hate, showing racial discrimination towards a group or an individual based on stereotypes. The violence that comes with racism is what makes it dangerous, and this is very sad. I honestly do not think that viewing your skin color can base you on how you are treated or be looked upon. If we all can think like this then maybe we can stop the dangers and racism can end.

comments.author: famososMuertos
comments.body: Well...! the question itself is dangerous to ask... that tells you how wrong the subject can be to deal with for the mirror of one circumstance or another, so much so that your subject under the context ended up here in O-F, But that doesn't leave me wanting to give you my opinion.We must start with avoiding this type of questioning or facing them, since that is even assuming that one is worse than another and that cannot be quantified, so in the concrete it is about common sense and good moral customs, if you have that, you don't have to face these kinds of questions.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Religion strictly isn’t dangerous but some radicals can be dangerous whilst supposedly following their religion. Islamists, as we all know can be very dangerous but it is a minority of people who ruin it for everybody else.Racism is disgusting & people should be locked up for vilifying people for the colour of their skin. We all bleed red, skin colour doesn’t make you any better or any worse than anybody else. Treat others as you would like to be treated.

comments.body: I think it's religion, when you look closer you'll see that religion is far dangerous than racism, religion actually attack the most important point of the humans brain, it change and forme the personality of someone starting from childhood, its hard to convince someone that have an idea when he was a baby. So i can say that religion is more dangerous.
